title: LIVER NOODLES (Leberknoedel)
directions: 1 Simmer the liver in boiling water for 30 minutes.
2 Then trim off any skin or ligaments and grind the liver fine Season
3 Mince the onion, add the butter, beat the eggs and add them.
4 Work into this paste the flour, using enough to make the paste quite stiff
5 Form into small balls and poach them in any meat soup or beef broth for 15 minutes.
6 Serve them swimming in the soup or as the meat with mashed potato and sauerkraut.
ingredients: 1 medium onion Local ShoppingOnions Bulb1 ea For $2.99
